patterns_discovered: Machine learning price forecasting with confidence intervals
Fallback to simple statistical forecasting if ML model unavailable
Hourly and daily price prediction with multiple strategies
Dynamic error handling and logging for prediction models
gotchas_discovered: Handles cases of insufficient training data
Uses different forecasting strategies based on model availability
Calculates confidence intervals using tree-based model ensemble

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Add 7-day cost forecasting method to PricePredictionService

recommendations: Add more comprehensive unit tests for ML and simple forecasting methods
Implement more robust error handling for edge cases
Consider adding more sophisticated confidence interval calculations
Document model training requirements and expectations
